vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
σίκερα, τό,
fermented liquor, strong drink, [LXX+NT+2nd c.AD+]. (Cf. Hebrew šēkār.)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
fermented drink, beerliquor
strong, or inebriating or fermented drink, Lk. 1:15*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 一種酒精飲料, 大麥啤酒 (路 1:15)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 一种酒精饮料, 大麦啤酒 (路 1:15)
